titles.title: This Is The Air I Breathe

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 c1 v3 v4 c1 c1 e1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
This is the air I breathe
This is the air I breathe
Your holy presence living in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is my daily bread
This is my daily bread
Your very word spoken to me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I I'm desperate for You
And I I'm lost without You
Oh Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are the air I breathe
You are the air I breathe
Your holy presence living in me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are my daily bread
You are my daily bread
Your very word spoken to me

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
This is the air I breathe
This is the air I breathe
